attributes.action: Make planting Wild Flower meadows mandatory on spare farm land, to help nature.
attributes.background: Our farming landscapes over the years, have become a world of mono cultures. Insects, flowers, birds and mammals are all declining. I want to see the creation of a network of wild flower meadows across the country, within our farmland. To be managed by local nature groups, for study and education.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "spare farm land".

You could start a new petition calling for the Government to fund the creation of a network of wild flower meadows if that is something you would like to see happen.
